snippet: It will take a fortune just to open the doors of a full-scale casino resort in New York, starting with a $1 million nonrefundable application fee.
abstract: New York State will most likely require that each of the winning developer-operators spend hundreds of millions of dollars to build one of the casino resorts upstate that officials hope will attract tens of thousands of customers and transform local economies; it will cost $1 million to even apply for a license and it is nonrefundable.
lead_paragraph: It will take a fortune just to open the doors of a full-scale casino resort in New York, starting with a $1 million nonrefundable application fee.

headline.main: Rivals for New York Casino Licenses Must Pay Millions to Play
headline.print_headline: Rivals for Casino Licenses Must Pay Millions to Play
